item.title: Starting LGBTQ+ Outreach
item.description: A Queerbrary Quick Start Guide> A Queerbrary Quick Start Guide # Outreach is how a library grows. We gain new patrons by connecting to underserved populations, listening to their needs, and either a) connecting them to services we have that meet that need or b) adding services in order to be more useful to them.
